cast.name: 布伦丹·奥卡罗尔 Brendan O'Carroll

this_title: Mrs. Brown's Boys: New Year Special 2019,Mammy's Motel
trans_title: 布朗夫人的儿子们2019新年特辑
introduction: During a storm the pipes burst in Winnie and Sharon's house so Agnes offers them a place to stay, leading to a storm within the Brown household. Agnes is asked by qiwan.cc Father Damian to do an eulogy for a neighbour she neither knew nor liked.
chinese_title: 布朗夫人的儿子们2019新年特辑
foreign_title: Mrs. Brown's Boys: New Year Special 2019,Mammy's Motel
